wikipedia_page.main: Edmund Howell  (born 1867) was a Welsh international footballer. He was part of the Wales national football team between 1888 and 1891, playing 3 matches and scoring 3 goals. He played his first match on 3 March 1888 against Ireland and his last match on 7 March 1891 against England.
